Reviews.Title: SC-462TC
Reviews.Author: Casper
Reviews.Content: This TV came in with the back broke from UPS. I probably should not have reviewed it as we never plugged it in to see if it worked. Just sent it back. Amazon was great about exchanging it so I give Amazon 5 Stars and the 1 Star is really for UPS

ProductInfo.Features:
46-Inch diagonal LCD screen with 1920 x 1080 panel resolution and 176 degree x 176 degree viewing angles
Brightness: 380 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio: 4000:1
Response time: 8.5 Mins
3HDMI and VGA input (15-Pin D-Sub)
ProductInfo.Name: Seiki SC-462TC 46-Inch 60Hz LCD TV (Black)
